name: Enchantress
title: Aiushtha
lore: Aiushtha appears to be a Dryad, but no mere forest sprite has her power. The Enchantress charms all who meet her.

untouchable.name: Untouchable
untouchable.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when they assault her.

enchant.name: Enchant
enchant.description: Takes control of an enemy creep or slows an enemy hero.

naturesAttendants.name: Nature's Attendants
naturesAttendants.description: Wisps surround Enchantress, healing her and nearby allies over time.

impetus.name: Impetus
impetus.description: Places a magical charge on attacks that deals bonus damage based on distance traveled.
